commit.message:
re PR fortran/17091 (gfortran MAIN__ symbol not marked TREE_PUBLIC)

	PR fortran/17091
	* gfortran.h (gfc_access): Give ACCESS_UNKNOWN value 0.
	* symbol.c (gfc_clear_attr): Use memset.

From-SVN: r86279

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2004-08-19  Paul Brook  <paul@codesourcery.com>
+
+	PR fortran/17091
+	* gfortran.h (gfc_access): Give ACCESS_UNKNOWN value 0.
+	* symbol.c (gfc_clear_attr): Use memset.
+
 2004-08-19  Paul Brook  <paul@codesourcery.com>
 
 	PR fortran/14976
